𓎄 ≈ 𓎃 #za ≈ 𐘍 ZA ≈ 𐀼 za ≈ 𓋹 sankᵗ ≠ 𓋩 sign

𓎃 charm, amulet
𓎃 shaman, magician
𓎃 caste, clan

𓎃 Schutz ≈ 𓎄 shelter (protection) ⇔ 𓎂 ⇔ 𓎅 #ţmA

𓊃 ≈ zam
𓎃 caste, clan
𓏶 𓎃 𓀀 | attendant |

𓎃 𓏤 | amulet | تَمِيمَة tamīma تۇمار tumar تىلسىم tilsim
𓎃 𓏤 | amulet | তাবিজ tabiz تعویذ ta'vīz

𓎃 ⇔ ⲥⲕⲉⲡⲏ 🇬🇷 f. protector, veil, covering, tent ⇔ 𓄚 𓈖 𓋳 σκηνή skēnḗ skins
